name: Google Summer of Code
description: Google’s global program bringing student developers into open source organizations.

name: GirlScript Summer of Code
description: Beginner-friendly nationwide program encouraging first open source contributions.

name: Hacktoberfest
description: Month-long celebration of open source encouraging contributions to public repositories.

name: MLH Fellowship
description: Remote, structured internship alternative working on real-world open source projects.

name: Outreachy
description: Paid remote internships supporting diversity in open source communities.

name: Social Winter of Code
description: Beginner-focused winter open source mentorship program.

name: Linux Foundation Mentorship
description: Industry-backed mentorship program for open source development.

name: Google Season of Docs
description: Program connecting open source organizations with technical writers.

name: Julia Seasons of Contributions
description: Seasonal program contributing to the Julia ecosystem.

name: Hyperledger Mentorship Program
description: Blockchain-focused mentorship under the Hyperledger ecosystem.
